attributes.action: Have all dogs muzzled not just xl
attributes.additional_details: I think if ALL dogs are muzzled I think would stop ALL public attacks why can other dogs be allowed to run when ANY dog is a risk to the public
attributes.background: ALL  dogs of any breeed to be muzzled in public

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require all dogs over a certain weight to be muzzled in public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643622

Replace ban on certain dog breeds with licences, muzzles and leads for all dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652710
